title: Clarkesworld Magazine - Science Fiction & Fantasy
author: JC Jongwon Park
raw_text: Cover Art  GUYS! Don't Lose Hope    JC Jongwon Park is an illustrator and concept artist based in Hamburg, Germany where he currently works in the video game, feature film, animation, TV commercial, and publishing industries. JC has created concept art for games such as Gears of War, Chorus, Everspace, Aion, and Legend of the Cryptids.
text:
Cover Art
GUYS! Don't Lose Hope
JC Jongwon Park is an illustrator and concept artist based in Hamburg, Germany where he currently works in the video game, feature film, animation, TV commercial, and publishing industries. JC has created concept art for games such as Gears of War, Chorus, Everspace, Aion, and Legend of the Cryptids.
excerpt: Clarkesworld Science Fiction and Fantasy Magazine and Podcast. This page: GUYS! Don't Lose Hope by JC Jongwon Park
